nsetools 0.0.9

    • News

introduction-to-nsetools

Aravind Hebbali and Lokesh Atreja

2019-11-15

introduction-to-nsetools.Rmd

NSE (National Stock Exchange) is the leading stock exchange of India, located in the city of Mumbai. While users can manually download data from NSE through a browser, importing this data into R is then cumbersome. The nsetools R package implements the retrieval of data from NSE and aims to reduce the pre-processing steps needed in analyzing such data.

nsetools is inspired by and a port of the Python package nsetools. The authors and contributors for this R package are not affiliated with NSE and NSE does not offer support for this R package.

With nsetools, you can fetch the following data related to:

  • stocks
    • quote for a given stock
    • symbol & name
    • check validity
    • most actively traded stocks in a month
    • 52 week high/low
    • top gainers/losers for the last trading session
  • index
    • list indices
    • check validity
    • fetch indices quote
  • futures & options
    • lot size
    • top gainers/losers for the last trading session
  • pre open data
    • nifty
    • nifty bank
    • nifty futures & options
  • indices advances & declines

Usage

nsetools uses consistent prefix nse_ for easy tab completion.

  • nse_index_ for index
  • nse_stock_ for stocks
  • nse_fo_ for futures and options
  • nse_preopen_ for preopen data
library(nsetools)

Stocks

Let us fetch the stock symbols and names from NSE.

nse_stock_code()
#> # A tibble: 1,640 x 2
#>    SYMBOL     NAME.OF.COMPANY                         
#>    <chr>      <chr>                                   
#>  1 20MICRONS  20 Microns Limited                      
#>  2 21STCENMGM 21st Century Management Services Limited
#>  3 3IINFOTECH 3i Infotech Limited                     
#>  4 3MINDIA    3M India Limited                        
#>  5 3PLAND     3P Land Holdings Limited                
#>  6 5PAISA     5Paisa Capital Limited                  
#>  7 63MOONS    63 moons technologies limited           
#>  8 A2ZINFRA   A2Z Infra Engineering Limited           
#>  9 AARTIDRUGS Aarti Drugs Limited                     
#> 10 AARTIIND   Aarti Industries Limited                
#> # ... with 1,630 more rows

Fetch most actively traded stocks in a month on NSE.

nse_stock_most_traded()
#> # A tibble: 12 x 6
#>    security              sharetotal trdQty nooftrades avgdailyturn turnover
#>    <chr>                      <dbl>  <dbl>      <dbl>        <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1 Yes Bank Limited            4.73  74406   13096866         1779    35577
#>  2 State Bank Of India         3.59  10008    6338506         1352    27045
#>  3 Infosys Limited             3.54   3830    6962011         1333    26663
#>  4 Reliance Industries ~       3.03   1643    4045200         1140    22804
#>  5 Indiabulls Hsg Fin L~       2.98  10506   10458041         1121    22424
#>  6 ICICI Bank Limited          2.64   4474    4052944          995    19893
#>  7 Axis Bank Limited           2.38   2595    3254378          897    17947
#>  8 HDFC Bank Limited           2.23   1372    3587458          841    16823
#>  9 Indusind Bank Limited       2.23   1312    3544497          840    16807
#> 10 Tata Motors Limited         2.18  11681    4400657          821    16427
#> 11 TOTAL of Top Ten sec~      29.5  121827   59740558        11120   222410
#> 12 TOTAL                     100    408051  258720343        37647   752931

Fetch the quote for a particular stock.

Fetch top gainers for the last trading session.

nse_stock_top_gainers()
#> # A tibble: 10 x 12
#>    symbol series lastCorpAnnounc~ lastCorpAnnounc~ openPrice highPrice
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>           <chr>                <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1 BHART~ EQ     2019-04-23       Rights 19:67 @ ~      358.      396.
#>  2 INFRA~ EQ     2019-08-22       Interim Dividen~      204.      226.
#>  3 SBIN   EQ     2018-06-15       Annual General ~      312       323 
#>  4 CIPLA  EQ     2019-07-31       Annual General ~      448       464.
#>  5 GRASIM EQ     2019-08-08       Annual General ~      735       768

Fetch stocks that have touched their 52 week highs during the day on NSE.

nse_stock_year_high()
#> # A tibble: 21 x 10
#>    symbol symbolDesc dt           value    year    ltp value_old   prev

Check if stock code is valid.

nse_stock_valid("inf")
#> [1] FALSE
nse_stock_valid("infy")
#> [1] TRUE

Index

List NSE indices.

nse_index_list()
#> # A tibble: 55 x 1
#>    name             
#>    <chr>            
#>  1 NIFTY 50 Pre Open
#>  2 NIFTY 50         
#>  3 NIFTY NEXT 50    
#>  4 NIFTY100 LIQ 15  
#>  5 NIFTY BANK       
#>  6 INDIA VIX        
#>  7 NIFTY 100        
#>  8 NIFTY 500        
#>  9 NIFTY MIDCAP 100 
#> 10 NIFTY MIDCAP 50  
#> # ... with 45 more rows

NSE indices quote.

nse_index_quote()
#> # A tibble: 55 x 4
#>    name              lastPrice change pChange
#>    <chr>                 <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1 NIFTY 50 Pre Open   11904.   32.1     0.27
#>  2 NIFTY 50            11932.   59.6     0.5 
#>  3 NIFTY NEXT 50       28261.   85.6     0.3 
#>  4 NIFTY100 LIQ 15      3689.   19.6     0.53
#>  5 NIFTY BANK          31045   295.      0.96
#>  6 INDIA VIX              15.1  -0.54   -3.46
#>  7 NIFTY 100           12058.   57.2     0.48
#>  8 NIFTY 500            9692.   41.2     0.43
#>  9 NIFTY MIDCAP 100    16808.   56.4     0.34
#> 10 NIFTY MIDCAP 50      4595.   23       0.5 
#> # ... with 45 more rows

Check if index is valid.

nse_index_valid("nify 50")
#> [1] FALSE
nse_index_valid("nifty 50")
#> [1] TRUE

Futures & Options

Fetch futures and options lot size from NSE.

nse_fo_lotsizes()
#> $indices
#> # A tibble: 3 x 4
#>   UNDERLYING SYMBOL NOV.19 DEC.19
#>   <chr>      <chr>  <chr>  <chr> 
#> 1 NIFTY BANK 19     19     20    
#> 2 NIFTY 50   102    57     58    
#> 3 NIFTY IT   103    48     49    
#> 
#> $stocks
#> # A tibble: 148 x 4
#>    UNDERLYING                SYMBOL NOV.19 DEC.19
#>    <chr>                     <chr>  <chr>  <chr> 
#>  1 ACC LIMITED               1      43     44    
#>  2 ADANI ENTERPRISES LIMITED 2      44     45    
#>  3 ADANI POWER LTD           4      3      4     
#>  4 AMARA RAJA BATTERIES LTD. 5      55     56    
#>  5 APOLLO HOSPITALS ENTER. L 7      49     50    
#>  6 APOLLO TYRES LTD          8      34     35    
#>  7 AUROBINDO PHARMA LTD      11     2      3     
#>  8 ADANI PORT & SEZ LTD      3      27     28    
#>  9 BAJAJ AUTO LIMITED        13     26     27    
#> 10 BAJAJ FINSERV LTD.        14     8      9     
#> # ... with 138 more rows

Preopen Data

Fetch data of pre open session of futures and options from NSE.

nse_preopen_fo()
#> # A tibble: 148 x 17
#>    symbol series xDt        caAct   iep   chn perChn   pCls trdQnty  iVal
#>    <chr>  <chr>  <date>     <chr> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 IDEA   EQ     NA         <NA>    2.7 -0.25  -8.47   2.95 2931259  79.1
#>  2 INFRA~ EQ     2019-08-22 INTE~ 204.  -4.7   -2.25 209.     30841  62.9

Fetch data of pre open session of Nifty Bank from NSE.

nse_preopen_nifty_bank()
#> # A tibble: 12 x 17
#>    symbol series xDt        caAct    iep   chn perChn   pCls trdQnty   iVal

#>  4 RBLBA~ EQ     NA         <NA>   321    3      0.94  318      5944  19.1 
#>  5 HDFCB~ EQ     2019-09-19 FACE~ 1284.   9.95   0.78 1274.    31819 409.  
#>  6 YESBA~ EQ     NA         <NA>    69.2  0.45   0.65   68.8  145736 101.
